author: fsamvura
title: Make Atala Prism DID THE Standard
description: Digital Identities can be created differently. Adoption and Usage will rely on Conformity, and Interoperability. A Standard is Key.
solution: ISDR/GL is implementing degree DIDs based on the Atala Prism Framework and recruiting partner local universities & colleges to adopt it.
experience:
Plutus Pioneer Program graduate in the second cohort and member of the Alala Prism Pioneer First cohort.
Developpers of Mobile Apps
